

def main():
    tasks = int(raw_input(''))
    for t in range(tasks):
        n = int(raw_input(''))
        arr = map (int, raw_input('').split())
        dep = map(int, raw_input('').split())

        status = [0 for _ in range(1, 1001)]

        for i in range(n):
            for j in range(arr[i], dep[i]):
                status[j] += 1

        print max(status)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
